data.name: MainForm_AddContentsOfSteamCommunity
data.value: This action will add the contents of a Steam community game list to the currently loaded game list. If you do not want to do this, close the open game list or profile first. Continue loading games?

data.name: MainForm_AddContentsOfSteamConfigFile
data.value: This action will add the contents of a Steam config file to the currently loaded game list, and will overwrite the category information for any existing games. If you do not want to do this, close the open profile or gamelist first. Continue loading file?

data.value: Warning: No game info found in the specified file.

data.value: {0} games need have no web-sourced data in the local database. Scrape now? This could take up to a few seconds per game.

data.value: No game data found. Please make sure the custom URL name is spelled correctly.

data.name: MainForm_NoProfileLoaded
data.value: No profile loaded. Create one now?

data.name: MainForm_OverwriteExistingNames
data.value: Do you want to overwrite existing names? Saying "No" will only rename games that do not have a name set.

data.name: Log_AutoCat_DBNull
data.value: Failed to Autocategorize game because database was null.

data.name: Log_AutoCat_GamelistNull
data.value: Failed to Autocategorize game because gamelist was null.

data.name: Log_AutoCat_GameNull
data.value: Failed to Autocategorize game because game was null.

data.name: MainForm_LaunchFailed
data.value: A non-Steam game must have been launched at least once from the Steam client before it can be launched externally.

data.name: DlgAutoCat_SelectValidType
data.value: You must select a valid AutoCat type.

data.name: DlgAutoCat_Help_Genre_RemoveExisting
data.value: Remove any pre-existing categories that could potentially be added by this AutoCat. Removes any category that consists of the Prefix followed by one of the unchecked genres below.

data.name: DlgAutoCat_Help_Prefix
data.value: Optional. Text prefix placed before the genre name.

data.name: DlgGameDBEntry_ParentMustBeInt
data.value: Parent must be empty or integer.

data.name: DlgProfile_Help_BypassIgnoreOnImport
data.value: Ignore app type restrictions when importing games from your existing category setup. Turn this on if you have games that Depressurizer refuses to recognize even after you categorize them in the Steam client and import categories.

data.name: DlgProfile_Help_ExportDiscard
data.value: Removes extraneous information for unrecognized games from your Steam config file. Does not remove games from your library or game list. Disable this if you are losing categories for games in your library that do not show up in Depressurizer.

data.name: DlgProfile_Help_IncludeUnknown
data.value: Include apps that are not in the database or are of unknown type. Normally, the game list includes only games that are listed as Games or Applications.

data.name: DlgProfile_Help_LocalUpdate
data.value: Parse files from your Steam installation to get a list of your games. Much faster and generally more accurate and reliable than a web update.

data.name: DlgProfile_Help_WebUpdate
data.value: Download a game list from your profile on the steamcommunity.com website. Requires your profile to be set to "Public".

data.name: GameDB_Log_ScrapingNoAppId
data.value: Scraping {0}: response URI ends with 'app', no ID found.

data.name: MainForm_Log_ExceptionAppInfo
data.value: Exception when auto-updating DB from AppInfo.

data.name: MainForm_Msg_ErrorAppInfo
data.value: Error encountered when updating database from AppInfo: {0}

data.name: MainForm_Status_LocalUpdate
data.value: Updated game list from config files, {0} found, {1} new.

data.name: MainForm_Status_LocalUpdateFailed
data.value: Failed to update from config files.

data.name: MainForm_Log_ExceptionExport
data.value: Exception encountered while exporting Steam config.

data.name: MainForm_Log_ExceptionImport
data.value: Exception encountered while importing the Steam config.

data.name: MainForm_Log_ExceptionWebUpdate
data.value: Exception encountered during game list web update.

data.name: MainForm_Log_ExceptionWebUpdateDialog
data.value: Exception encountered by game list web update dialog.

data.name: DlgAutoCat_Help_ListMinScore
data.value: Tags that fall below this "score" will not show up on the list.

data.name: DlgAutoCat_Help_ListOwnedOnly
data.value: Only use the games you own to generate the tag list. Otherwise, all games in the database will be used.

data.name: DlgAutoCat_Help_ListTagsPerGame
data.value: Only this many tags from each game will be processed. Ex: Set to 10 to only process the first ten tags from each game and ignore the rest. Set to 0 to process all tags from each game.

data.name: DlgAutoCat_Help_ListWeightFactor
data.value: With this set to 1, each tag's score is simply the number of games that it appears on. With this higher than one, tags earlier in games' tag lists receive a higher score. The higher the number, the more weight is placed on tag position.

data.name: DlgAutoCat_Help_ListExcludeGenres
data.value: Do not include tags that match Steam genre names, like Action or Strategy.

data.name: DlgAutoCat_Help_ListScoreSort
data.value: Sort tags by their score, with the higher scores first. Otherwise, sorts alphabetically.

data.name: MainForm_Help_AdvancedCategories
data.value: In advanced mode, games will be displayed if they meet the following criteria: If at least one category is marked with a CHECKMARK ("Allowed"), the game must belong to at least one of these categories. A game must be in all categories marked with a CIRCLE ("Required"). A game must NOT be in any categories marked with an X ("Excluded").

data.name: AutoCatGenrePanel_Help_TagFallback
data.value: If a game exists in the database but has no genres defined, look for tags that match genre names instead.

data.name: AutoCatYearPanel_Help_Unknown
data.value: If checked, games with no release date will be autocategorized with the name below. If unchecked, games with no date will be skipped.

data.name: AutoCatUserScore_Dialog_ConfirmPreset
data.value: This will erase your current rules. Continue?

data.name: AutoCatUserScore_Help_Rules
data.value: Each game will be assigned to a category with the name of the first rule that matches. If a game matches more than one rule, it will only be assigned to a category for the first one. If a game does not match any rules, no category will be assigned.

data.name: AutoMode_Help_Export
data.value: Export your categories to Steam after running autocats. If this is disabled, changes will not show up in the Steam client. Recommended: Enabled

data.name: AutoMode_Help_ImportCats
data.value: Import existing categories from Steam before running autocat operations. If this is disabled, manual categorizations done through the client may be lost.

data.name: AutoMode_Help_Launch
data.value: Will launch Steam after completing autocats.

data.name: AutoMode_Help_Output
data.value: If set to Normal, the output window will remain open until you close it. If set to Quiet, the output window will automatically close unless errors are encountered. If set to Silent, the output window will always automatically close.

data.name: AutoMode_Help_SaveDB
data.value: Save the database if any changes are made to it. Recommended: Enabled

data.name: AutoMode_Help_SaveProfile
data.value: Save the profile after running autocats. Recommended: Enabled

data.name: AutoMode_Help_SteamCheck
data.value: If set to Check and Close, attempt to close Steam if it is running. (Recommended.) If set to Check and Abort, stop AutoCat operation if Steam is running. If set to Skip, don't check whether Steam is running.

data.name: AutoMode_Help_Tolerant
data.value: If disabled, will terminate after any error. If enabled, will continue if non-fatal errors are encountered. Recommended: Enabled

data.name: AutoMode_Help_UpdateAppInfo
data.value: Update the database with information from the local database before running autocat operations. Note that this data is not currently used for autocategorization, so it is unimportant.

data.name: AutoMode_Help_UpdateLib
data.value: Update your library with new games before running autocat operations. Will obey profile settings for update data source. Recommended: Enabled

data.name: AutoMode_Help_UpdateWeb
data.value: Attempt to download information for any games not found in the database. Can be slow, but will only download information for games that need it. If this is unchecked, newer games may not be categorized. Recommended: Enabled
